title: This Is What Makes Us Girls
author: Lana Del Rey
lyrics:
[00:10.76] Remember how we used to party up all night?
[00:14.91] Sneakin' out and lookin' for a taste of real life
[00:18.49] Drinkin' in the small town firelight
[00:21.73] (Pabst Blue Ribbon on ice)
[00:24.72] Sweet sixteen, and we had arrived
[00:27.87] Walkin' down the streets as they whistle, "Hi, hi!"
[00:31.42] Stealin' police cars with the senior guys
[00:34.83] Teachers said we'd never make it out alive
[00:38.24] There she was, my new best friend
[00:41.03] High heels in her hand, swayin' in the wind
[00:44.49] While she starts to cry
[00:46.69] Mascara running down her little Bambi eyes
[00:49.59] "Lana, how I hate those guys"
[00:52.36] This is what makes us girls
[00:54.96] We all look for heaven and we put love first
[00:58.33] Somethin' that we'd die for, it's our curse
[01:01.84] Don't cry about it, don't cry about it
[01:06.04] This is what makes us girls
[01:08.72] We don't stick together 'cause we put love first
[01:12.37] Don't cry about him, don't cry about him
[01:15.79] It's all gonna happen
[01:20.70] And that's where the beginnin' of the end begun
[01:24.34] Everybody knew that we had too much fun
[01:27.80] We were skippin' school and drinkin' on the job
[01:31.37] With the boss
[01:33.86] Sweet sixteen, and we had arrived
[01:37.47] Baby's table dancin' at the local dive
[01:40.87] Cheerin' our names in the pink spotlight
[01:44.13] Drinkin' cherry schnapps in the velvet night
[01:47.80] Yo, we used to go break into the hotel
[01:51.83] Glimmerin', we'd swim
[01:54.00] Runnin' from the cops in our black bikini tops
[01:56.92] Screamin', "Get us while we're hot, get us while we're hot"
[02:00.63] (C'mon, take a shot)
[02:02.04] This is what makes us girls
[02:04.44] We all look for heaven and we put love first
[02:07.71] Somethin' that we'd die for, it's our curse
[02:11.26] Don't cry about it, don't cry about it
[02:15.48] This is what makes us girls
[02:18.26] We don't stick together 'cause we put love first
[02:21.79] Don't cry about him, don't cry about him
[02:25.17] It's all gonna happen
[02:29.95] The prettiest in-crowd that you had ever seen
[02:32.98] Ribbons in our hair, and our eyes gleamed mean
[02:36.54] A freshmen generation of degenerate beauty queens
[02:40.72] And you know somethin'?
[02:42.82] They were the only friends I ever had
[02:45.68] We got into trouble and when stuff got bad
[02:49.57] I got sent away, I was wavin' on the train platform
[02:53.84] Cryin' 'cause I know I'm never comin' back
[02:57.26] This is what makes us girls
[03:00.35] We all look for heaven and we put love first
[03:03.64] Somethin' that we'd die for, it's our curse
[03:06.90] Don't cry about it, don't cry about it
[03:11.26] This is what makes us girls
[03:13.91] We don't stick together 'cause we put love first
[03:17.47] Don't cry about him, don't cry about him
[03:20.73] It's all gonna happen
[03:23.73]
